text: Operation Harpoon may refer to: * Operation Harpoon (1942), an Allied convoy sent to supply Malta in the Axis-dominated central Mediterranean Sea * Operation Harpoon (2002), a Canadian-American operation against the Taliban in the Arma mountains of Afghanistan * Operation Harpoon, an operation by Israeli Mossad and Shurat HaDin targeting terrorist money networks ==See also== * Operation Harpune, a major German deception plan of 1941 to conceal preparations for Operation Barbarossa
title: Operation Harpoon
